name: Hellpit (itch)
description:
You are thrown in dungeon filled with traps.

Left for dead.

It's up to you crawl your way to freedom.

A 3d Platformer where you evade many obstacles and traps lay in front of you.

The game is simple, just jump and move out of your way from danger.

No single traps and obstacles layout are the same,

Use precise timing to cross safely.

This is a game which need your patience and timed reaction to pull it off.

"He who occupies the high ground…will fight to advantage." -  Sun Tzu
  • Featuring many uniques traps and platforms
  •  Use well timed jump to escape traps and jump from one platform to another.
  • Simple gameplay mechanics(sprint and jump) 
  • Game designed with balanced difficulties all over the level.

OS : Windows 10 (x64 bit)

CPU: Intel i5-2550K or better

memory: 8 GB (minimum)

GPU: nvidia geforce GTX970 /AMD Radeon R9 390 (from year 2015)  or better

Space: 2.3 GB
